channel.title: Planetplanet on David Moreno blog
channel.description: Recent content in Planetplanet on David Moreno blog

item.title: The new Planeta Linux engine
item.description: So I’ve spent quite some time in the last couple of months (whenever I had a chance, actually), to redesign how the core of Planeta Linux works, and I’ll explain all the changes I’ve made to make it a much better solution that fully fits our current needs. If you are reading this with a feed reader, star this item, share the item, retweet the post! Let everyone know we are doing this for the Linux Latin American community!
